snippet: Sick of Republican dominance, Democrats are trying to get off the ground, with efforts like Battleground Texas, started by operatives from the Obama campaign.
lead_paragraph: Sick of Republican dominance, Democrats are trying to get off the ground, with efforts like Battleground Texas, started by operatives from the Obama campaign.

headline.seo: Democrats Rally in a G.O.P. Stronghold
headline.main: Democrats Aim to Turn Texas Shade of Blue
headline.print_headline: Democrats Aim To Turn Texas Shade of Blue
